title: 'Rachel Reeves' Budget Ledger' and 'Jury trials scrapped'
description: Budget day is here and the newspapers focus on the chancellor's highly-anticipated statement.
content: Budget day has arrived and its policies, predictions, and preparations fill the front pages of the newspapers. The Sun says Chancellor Rachel Reeves will announce "new taxes on fun" and it lists "work, pensions, houses, taxis, milkshakes, hotel stays... [3033 chars]

title: Brazil's ex-president Jair Bolsonaro begins 27-year prison sentence for coup attempt
description: Bolsonaro began his prison sentence on Tuesday for leading a failed coup to stay in power after losing the 2022 election.
content:
Former Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro began a 27-year prison sentence on Tuesday for leading a coup attempt after losing the 2022 presidential election.
Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes, who is overseeing the case, ruled that Bolsonaro w... [2255 chars]

title: What comes next in the James Comey and Letitia James cases?
description: The government could appeal or attempt to retry the cases after a judge threw out the indictments
content:
Two of President Trump's most prominent critics secured legal victories on Monday when a federal judge threw out the government's charges against them.
For weeks since their indictments, former FBI Director James Comey and New York Attorney General L... [3413 chars]

title: Estevao outshines Lamine Yamal and conjures Messi memories as Chelsea crush Barcelona in Champions League
description: Chelsea 3-0 Barcelona: Estevao scored a brilliant solo goal on a night when perhaps the two best 18-year-olds in world football shared the same pitch
content: Lamine Yamal and Estevao are both 18, both possess a magical left foot and both are already at home on the Champions League stage. They have another thing in common: Yamal has spent most of his young life being compared to Lionel Messi, pre-ordained ... [5864 chars]

title: Putin's foreign minister issues 4-word response to Ukraine peace deal
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov issued a chilling warning as the US and Russia work to broker a peace deal in Ukraine
content:
Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has lambasted Europe for its past role in attempting to broker peace between Russia and Ukraine , stating emphatically: "You had your chance," on Tuesday.
